manifest.name: stop-iteration-iterator
manifest.description: Firefox 17-26 iterators throw a StopIteration object to indicate "done". This normalizes it.

scripts.postversion: auto-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-edit --amend && git tag -f "v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")"

manifest.readme:
# stop-iteration-iterator <sup>[![Version Badge][npm-version-svg]][package-url]</sup>

[![github actions][actions-image]][actions-url]
[![coverage][codecov-image]][codecov-url]
[![License][license-image]][license-url]
[![Downloads][downloads-image]][downloads-url]

[![npm badge][npm-badge-png]][package-url]

Firefox 17-26 iterators throw a StopIteration object to indicate "done". This normalizes it.

# Usage

```js
var stopIterationIterator = require('stop-iteration-iterator');

var s = new Set([1, 2]);

var iterator = stopIterationIterator(s.keys());

iterator.next(); // { done: false, value: 1 }
```

## Tests
Simply clone the repo, `npm install`, and run `npm test`
